description:
Sakamoto Ryoma`s thirst for adventure put him at the center of the action during the fall of the shogunate. And how can you have high adventure in the 1800s without your own ship?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakumatsu ni Ryouma Ari! Venture Zamurai Hen
Ryoma in the Bakumatsu! Tales of the Venture Samurai
幕末に龍馬あり! ~ベンチャー侍編~
